title: VMware security advisory (AV26-178)
description: On February 26, 2026, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: VMware Tanzu for Postgres  versions prior to 18.2.0, 17.8.0, 16.12.0, 15.16.0 and 14.21.0
VMware Tanzu for Postgres on Kubernetes  versions prior to 4.3.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
